name: users
description: This table contains all user records of Bindle.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Unique identifier of a user.

columns.name: email
columns.description: User’s email, unique.

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: User’s first name.

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: User’s last name.

columns.name: country
columns.description: User’s signup country.

columns.name: signup_date
columns.description: Date when user signed up.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: Timestamp when user record was created, we can treat it as signup date and time.

columns.name: status
columns.description: What status user has in Bindle, could be free (can read only free books) or customer (user who purchased a subscription, can read all books).

columns.name: age
columns.description: User’s age.

columns.name: referrer_id
columns.description: id of another user who referred this user (this is usually set when users sign up via referral link).

columns.name: visitor_id
columns.description: Identifier of a user in the web_analytics.pageviews table. Generated by a web analytics system and stored in a cookie.

columns.name: utm_source
columns.description: utm_source in URL when user signed up, used for marketing attribution

columns.name: utm_campaign
columns.description: utm_campaign in URL when user signed up, used for marketing attribution

columns.name: utm_term
columns.description: utm_term in URL when user signed up, used for marketing attribution

columns.name: utm_content
columns.description: utm_content in URL when user signed up, used for marketing attribution

columns.name: utm_medium
columns.description: utm_medium in URL when user signed up, used for marketing attribution

columns.name: adjust_tracker
columns.description: Adjust tracker in case user signed up via an Adjust link https://app.adjust.com/gxel3d1.

columns.name: adjust_campaign
columns.description: The value of campaign paramenter in Adjust URL.

columns.name: adjust_adgroup
columns.description: The value of adgroup paramenter in Adjust URL.

columns.name: adjust_creative
columns.description: The value of creative paramenter in Adjust URL.
